Author: Deleted User#0000
Content: Is there any .finished file remaining there?

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content: You need to delete all the .finished files (making backup first of SWAPS folder is a good idea).

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
1 - backup SWAPS folder.
2 - stop HyperDEX.
3 - delete all files which names end in ".finished"
4 - restart HyperDEX.
